document_title: Curved penis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content: When making a diagnosis, the doctor usually asks the patient about symptoms, history of injury, and conducts an examination of the penis. The doctor can measure the degree of curvature of the penis by injecting an erection-stimulant drug. Men may also request a penile ultrasound.
subsection_title: duong vat cong.json. Diagnosis of curved penis
subsection_data:
duong vat cong.json. Diagnosis of curved penis
When making a diagnosis, the doctor usually asks the patient about symptoms, history of injury, and conducts an examination of the penis. The doctor can measure the degree of curvature of the penis by injecting an erection-stimulant drug. Men may also request a penile ultrasound.
